title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - North Sea, Norwegian Ocean and Irish Sea oil/gas offshore
description:
In this video we will look at the update released for the oil/gas offshore locations in the North Sea, Norwegian Ocean and Irish Sea. We will do this in style with the Airbus H135 Helicopter. During this video we fly to one of the rigs and have a closer look at it. In total the addon contains over 500 rigs spread across the different parts of the North Sea, Norwegian Ocean and the Irish Sea.

If this video made you curious and you want to see the rigs yourself you can download the addon via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/5794/north-sea-oilrigs

If you also want to give the helicopter a try you can download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/8970/airbus-h135-helicopter-project
